name: Too Much Work For Only One Goddess
name_original: Too Much Work For Only One Goddess
description:
You are a being created by the Fairy Goddess, Aine, to continue her role and help nature rise from the chaos. Tired of the continual destruction caused by man in nature, it goes out of balance.

This is a management game prototype that i made with a group of friends with the help of mentors as a prize of a game jam. The development of the game is stopped by undefined time.
